tool_description: Calculates comprehensive credit scores and risk ratings based on financial data, payment history, and various risk factors using industry-standard algorithms.

customer_id.description: Unique identifier for the customer being scored

revenue_figures.description: Historical revenue data in numerical format

payment_scores.description: Payment performance scores from payment history analysis

scoring_model.description: Scoring model to use: standard, conservative, or aggressive

error_messages: Invalid customer_id: Customer identifier cannot be empty or null.
Invalid revenue_figures: Must provide at least one positive revenue value.
Invalid payment_scores: Payment scores must be between 0 and 100.
Invalid debt_to_equity_ratio: Ratio must be a positive number.
Invalid industry_risk_factor: Must be between 0.1 and 2.0.
Invalid scoring_model: Must be one of [standard, conservative, aggressive].
Invalid weight values: Weights must be between 0.1 and 0.8, and weight_payment_history + weight_financial_strength should not exceed 1.0.
usage: Provide customer_id, revenue_figures, payment_scores, and debt_to_equity_ratio. Optionally customize scoring with industry_risk_factor, scoring_model, and weight parameters. The tool returns credit scores and risk classifications.

customer_id.description: Customer identifier for the scored entity

overall_credit_score.description: Overall credit score on a 0-1000 scale

risk_rating.description: Risk classification: Low, Medium, High, or Critical

payment_score_component.description: Payment history component of the overall score

financial_strength_component.description: Financial strength component of the overall score

score_confidence.description: Confidence level in the score calculation (0-100)

calculation_date.description: Date when score was calculated in date-time format
